content: **this crochet pattern is free to view online on my website here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-halloween-amigurumi-eyeball-crochet-pattern** > also available as a free video tutorial on youtube here https //youtu be/mre2oquoyws the halloween eyeballs pdf pattern is available to download for a small price it includes high quality step by step photographs throughout you will also receive an image-free printer friendly copy written using us crochet terms with a conversion chart to help with converting into uk terms make some fun halloween amigurumi eyeballs with this crochet pattern you can use these as little gifts to hand out to trick or treaters hang them up as halloween decorations or use them to make keyrings or bag charms you can use any yarn weight or type for this pattern and adjust your hook size to suit just keep to the same yarn weight for each colour exact gauge is not important for this pattern just use a hook 1-2 sizes smaller than recommended on your chosen yarn label the size of your finished eyeballs will depend on your chosen yarn weight and hook size as a guide here are the approximate diameter measurements of my finished eyeballs dk/light worsted yarn with a 3mm hook = 3 5cm/1 3 aran/worsted yarn with a 4mm hook = 4 8cm/1 9 chunky/bulky yarn with a 4 5mm hook = 5 5cm/2 2 chunky/bulky yarn with a 5mm hook = 6cm/2 4 you will need any weight yarn in white less than 30yds per eyeball black inner iris colour and outer iris colour less than 2yds of each to add optional veins you will also need a small amount of red or dark pink yarn or embroidery thread a crochet hook 1-2 sizes smaller than recommended for your chosen yarn weight toy stuffing polyester fibrefill stitch marker yarn needle scissors optional extras thread/string to make hanging decorations or keyring attachment to make a keyring or bag charms 1 https //youtu be/mre2oquoyws
